Package org.gjt.sp.jedit.manager

Interface BufferManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BufferManagerImpl
    public interface BufferManager
    The buffer manager is here to manage the Buffer linked list.
    Since:
    jEdit 5.6pre1
